title: Pixel 4 XL keeps rebooting every hours after Android 11 update
content:
After I update Android 11 OTA on Pixel 4 XL, it constantly reboot about every 30 min to 3 hours.
I tried factory reset and restore from backup.
And safe mode but the problem persists.
I don't have any app that control LED but you should be aware that I switched and transfer files from my previous Pixel 2 XL.

To clarify:
After rebooting, I can use it normally for some time, then it reboot again. Safe mode with Wifi use but problem still persists. I might try factory reset after recovery mode but I don't really sure it's gonna solve the problem as I found this: https://piunikaweb.com/2020/09/16/some-google-pixel-2-units-randomly-restarting-after-android-11-update/ 

On an unrelated note, I try screen recording don't save and file permanently lost before I do factory reset and I haven't tried again. Few photos have lost before but not often and making me check after every photo taking.

Please help
